channel.title: People can not connect to my client get stuck on update server
channel.description:
Title says it all,
I am running a 474 i have been through client.java and changed server ip from 127.0.0.1 to my server ip i have been in my signlink file and changed the code to work properly i have added 43594 to my exception rule in my firewall on my router and also in my firewall on windows i have been able to successfully host my 317 server i portforward via uttorent sorry if this is not enough detail i am quite braindead i've been working on the 317 source for the past 2 days straight and its 2 am where i live.
can anyone out there help me at all or i have been looking into webclients would this solve any of these problems im coming across i would of thought it would still mean people would get stuck on update server but please let me know
Regards Junes
*Edit* I am willing to pay via paypal an agreed price if you can prove that you can get the source running *edit*

item.title: People can not connect to my client get stuck on update server
item.dc:creator: @Junes Junes
item.description:
@Junes wrote:

failure its a 474 server it doesnt have gui and it doesnt have egui nor server.java.

if you read through my post thoroughly then you would of realised i changed code 127.0.0.1, 0.0.0.0 to my ip

thanks anyway i guess…

Read full topic
item.source: People can not connect to my client get stuck on update server

item.title: People can not connect to my client get stuck on update server
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

you dont need to pay people to help you on a help section, now you may or may not have these files if you dont move to the next if you do check em for 127.0.0.1 0.0.0.0 or just plain server = ""

client.java
gui.java
egui.java
server.java

all clientside if you didnt know.

Read full topic
